title: not able to find this font
content:
please help with the ID of this font for school project

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418105638im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1shop_3966.jpg)
author: stargate

comments.content:
Phanlop Thonsuk issued a huge series of typefaces from 1995 - 2000 for Latin and Thai. All were prefixed PSL. This sample has some of the design characteristics of PSL Isara AD Bold. (/S enlarged.)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418105638im_/http:/typophile.com/files/shop1_4798.jpg)
